metadata.title: CVE-2023-32728 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Zabbix Agent 2 item key smart.disk.get does not sanitize its parametersbefore passing them to a shell command resulting possible vulnerability forremote code execution.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
